title: Interactive Text Chat Collaborative Learning for Improving Russian Vocabulary and Oral Expression Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level Russian vocabulary and basic grammar proficiency
context.additional_context: Non-degree adult learning program for collaborative Russian vocabulary usage and oral expression practice via text chat with peers in smartphone-based environments

learning_goals: Learners can acquire and utilize over 150 intermediate-level Russian vocabulary items through interactive text chats with peers over 8 weeks.
Learners can improve oral expression skills by performing language-related behaviors (error correction, meaning negotiation, positive feedback) at least 10 times in real-time chat activities.
Learners can experience language use required for real-world communication by successfully completing 12 situational role-play tasks in collaboration with chat partners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
